group_1.narration: Winning by a landslide!@The first place for the pair category goes to…
And now, for your prize,@a week’s supply of our highest-grade eggs!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:103701:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]We have so many fresh eggs now!
That’s a great load off our budget, and now@we can spend more on other ingredients!

group_1.textRight: The contest was super fun too,@I’m glad we participated!

group_1.textLeft: …Well, I suppose you’re right,@although I didn’t want to do it at first…
I must thank Rabi for getting me to@push through.

group_1.textRight: Good job, both of you.
*Giggle* You really did win,@just like I said you would.

group_1.textLeft: Wow, you seem to be quite proud of yourself,@Rabi.
I do owe you though…thank you for that.

group_1.textRight: *Giggle*

group_1.textLeft: You took some pics of us, didn’t you,@Rabitan? Send ’em to me later!

group_1.textRight: I did. I was at a good spot,@so they came out quite lovely.
There’s also plenty of Lady Nayuta, too.

group_1.textLeft: I appreciate it.

group_1.textRight: Well then, this ended up taking quite some@time, so we should hurry back home.

group_1.textLeft: Alright, we managed to get plenty of@ingredients.

group_1.textRight: I really hope we can hand them all out@by afternoon.
How many can we make with this?

group_1.textLeft: No idea… I’m not familiar with the time@required to bake a cake.

group_1.textRight: Remind me again, who was the one talking@about “her estimates” and whatnot…?

group_1.textLeft: Y-you don’t have to sound so mean when@bringing that up…

group_1.textRight: Well, if nothing goes wrong, it should take@about an hour to make a whole cake.
We could make quite a few if we start now.

group_1.textLeft: Ooh, that’s surprisingly fast. We could make@at least two or three whole cakes then.

group_1.textRight: But the legend says that she handed out@“treats,” so we might want some variety.

group_1.textLeft: Indeed… Otherwise, we’d simply be the@cake-giving sorceresses.

group_1.textRight: Then, how about cookies? We can make them@with the ingredients at hand.

group_1.textLeft: Cookies… Sounds good, but…do we have@the time?
Mii and Mom made cookies a really@long time ago.
They needed to go in the fridge overnight…@it took a lot of time, y’know?

group_1.textRight: It’s true that the regular recipe goes like that, but@you can also do it without leaving them to cool.
I’m sure the method will show up if you@search for it on the internet.

group_1.textLeft: Hmmm…@[chara:103701:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:103701:motion_100][chara:103701:cheek_0][chara:103701:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:103701:lipSynch_1]…You're right, there it is!

group_1.textRight: Whoaaa!@You really know your stuff, Rabitaaan!

group_1.textLeft: I also found a cake recipe here.

group_1.textRight: We're all set then!

group_1.textLeft: Now then, Mikage, let's start baking.
Thank you for the help, Rabi.
You may take this time to attend to your@own deeds now.

group_1.textRight: Do you intend on making these by yourselves…?

group_1.textLeft: Well, it wouldn’t be right for us to make you
follow along with our every whim,@would it?

group_1.textRight: While I appreciate your consideration…
It takes a substantial level of skill@to make these in such amounts.

group_1.textLeft: It's okay, Rabitan.
I won't deny that we're in a tough spot,@but if this is all it is...
Then I trust that Mikage and I’s teamwork@will be enough to get us through it.
We were the pair-category champions,@after all.

group_1.textRight: I can only see your attempts at baking ending@up in disaster…

group_1.textLeft: Ah! You think we’re idiots!
Hmph, it’s fine, the two of us have@changed our ways.
I can see that clearly now.
